page.title: 11NEW HOUSING, LIMPSFIELD
page.content: Padbrook 1 to 62 is the new estate of timber framed houses being built in {Limpsfield. }The site was originally pasture with a few cottages which have been demolished. Houses range from two to five bedrooms. The larger houses are bought by customers aged around 40 with one or two children up to 12 years old. The smaller houses are bought by elderly ladies who are moving from larger houses. There are no first time buyers. Prices range from Â£72,250 for a two bedroomed semi-detached to Â£142,000 for a five bedroomed detached house. { Limpsfield}dates back to Domesday so proposals for development are subject to strict planning policies which ensure that the past is respected, thereby harmonizing with the surroundings.
